patthana8.67:4.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.67:5.1: Nanakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.67:6.1: Nakāmāvacarañca nanakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.67:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
